text: Lothar de Maizière (; born 2 March 1940) is a German Christian Democratic politician. In 1990, he was the only democratically elected Prime Minister of the German Democratic Republic. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of East Germany Category:Foreign ministers of Germany Category:Politicians from Thuringia Category:Special Affairs ministers of Germany
title: Lothar de Maizière
